data.comment: In the minute -1, There are 1000 people in the crowd for today's match.
The match is underway in Cagliari.
Antonio Di Martino signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Crotone's area.
In the minute 2, Joao Pedro (Cagliari) strikes at Sardegna Arena but his header is cleared.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 4, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Cagliari.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
In the minute 8, Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Cagliari.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
In the minute 10, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ahmad Benali of Crotone smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Crotone at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 14, Antonio Di Martino awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In Cagliari Cagliari attack through Babis Lykogiannis. The finish is off target, however.
Crotone have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Junior Messias for Crotone drives towards goal at Sardegna Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Luca Cigarini (Crotone) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 18, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Goal! Crotone have got their heads in front thanks to a Junior Messias strike.
In the minute 21, Great play from Arkadiusz Reca to set up the goal.
Antonio Di Martino awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Crotone.
In the minute 24, Free kick in a good position for Cagliari!
Babis Lykogiannis is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
In the minute 28, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Antonio Di Martino signals a Crotone throw-in in Cagliari's half.
In the minute 30, Arkadiusz Reca of Crotone is pulled up for offside.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Razvan Marin for Cagliari has been booked by Antonio Di Martino and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 33, Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Giovanni Simeone.
In the minute 35, Joao Pedro with an assist there.
Cagliari are coming forward and Joao Pedro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Antonio Di Martino awards Crotone a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Simeon Nwankwo of Crotone gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 39, Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo gets in a shot on goal at Sardegna Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Crotone at Sardegna Arena.
Simeon Nwankwo (Crotone) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Crotone's Junior Messias gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
Goal! Salvatore Molina levels the match at 2-2.
At Sardegna Arena, Cagliari are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Sardegna Arena.
Goal! A Riccardo Sottil header gives Cagliari a 3-2 lead in Cagliari.
That's a fine assist from Gabriele Zappa.
The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 46, Free kick Cagliari.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Luca Cigarini (Crotone) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
The match at Sardegna Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Joao Pedro, who is down injured.
Crotone have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Joao Pedro is back on his feet again.
Cagliari are pushing forward but Giovanni Simeone's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Crotone at Sardegna Arena.
Lisandro Magallan (Crotone) has received a yellow card from Antonio Di Martino.
Cagliari pushes forward through Nahitan Nandez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Crotone.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 57, Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Antonio Di Martino signals a Crotone throw-in in Cagliari's half.
In the minute 59, Cagliari drive upfield and Joao Pedro gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crotone defender.
Cagliari's Marko Rog breaks free at Sardegna Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
In the minute 61, Cagliari needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Antonio Di Martino signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Cagliari's area.
Andrea Rispoli is replacing Arkadiusz Reca for the away team.
In the minute 61, Milos Vulic is replacing Salvatore Molina for Crotone at Sardegna Arena.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Crotone's Junior Messias gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 63, Antonio Di Martino awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Cagliari drives forward and Nahitan Nandez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 66, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone.
At Sardegna Arena, Babis Lykogiannis has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Crotone.
Antonio Di Martino awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Crotone are pushing forward but Andrea Rispoli's finish is wide of the goal.
Antonio Di Martino awards Cagliari a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Eusebio Di Francesco (Cagliari) is making a first substitution, with Adam Ounas replacing Riccardo Sottil.
Cagliari's Adam Ounas misses with an attempt on goal.
Crotone have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Crotone at Sardegna Arena.
The away team have replaced Pedro Pereira with Giovanni Crociata. This is the third substitution made today by Giovanni Stroppa.
Cagliari push upfield but Antonio Di Martino quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 79, Joao Pedro for Cagliari gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Eusebio Di Francesco is making the team's second substitution at Sardegna Arena with Leonardo Pavoletti replacing Giovanni Simeone.
Cagliari make their third substitution with Ragnar Klavan replacing Babis Lykogiannis.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
In the minute 82, Cagliari needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Cagliari.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Joao Pedro (Cagliari) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
In the minute 84, In Cagliari, Leonardo Pavoletti (Cagliari) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
It's now 4-2 in Cagliari as Joao Pedro scores for Cagliari.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 88, Christian Oliva is on a sub for Razvan Marin for Cagliari.
The home team replace Gabriele Zappa with Paolo Farago.
Throw-in for Crotone at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 89, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cagliari will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Crotone.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Cagliari.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cagliari's Leonardo Pavoletti attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cagliari.
Cagliari's Marko Rog is on target but unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-2.
Crotone make their fourth substitution with Emmanuel Riviere replacing Simeon Nwankwo.
Crotone's Ahmad Benali has been booked in Cagliari.
